briefTitle: A Study of Two Different Dose Combinations of Nivolumab in Combination With Ipilimumab in Subjects With Previously Untreated, Unresectable or Metastatic Melanoma
officialTitle: Phase IIIb/IV, Randomized, Double Blinded, Study of Nivolumab 3 mg/kg in Combination With Ipilimumab 1 mg/kg vs Nivolumab 1 mg/kg in Combination With Ipilimumab 3 mg/kg in Subjects With Previously Untreated, Unresectable or Metastatic Melanoma

arms.label: Nivolumab 3 mg/kg IV + Ipilimumab 1 mg/kg IV
Ipilimumab 3 mg/kg IV + Nivolumab 1 mg/kg IV

summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate two different dose combinations of nivolumab and ipilimumab in the treatment of melanoma.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Percentage of Participants With Drug-Related Grade 3 - 5 Adverse Events (AEs)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From first dose of study treatment up to primary completion date 20-Apr-2017 (up to approximately 12 months)

effectByArm.arm: Nivolumab 3 mg/kg IV + Ipilimumab 1 mg/kg IV
Ipilimumab 3 mg/kg IV + Nivolumab 1 mg/kg IV
